this_title: Ancestors in the Americas series - Part 1: COOLIES, SAILORS, SETTLERS: Voyage to the New World
introduction: Traces the global forces that brought the first Asians -- Filipinos, Chinese and Asian Indians -- to the Americas and the Caribbean in the 18th and 19th centuries, and looks at their lives as sailors, coolies, and finally settlers.
chinese_title: Ancestors in the Americas series - Part 1: COOLIES, SAILORS, SETTLERS: Voyage to the New World
